definitions.body: ] lioness (cf. Ar. usage, and Ge 49:9, Nu 24:9, Job 4:11, etc.; but this by no means certain);—´[[ל]] abs. Ge 49:9 + 10 t.;—Is 30:6 (‖[[לַיִשׁ]]), Job 38:39 (‖[[כְּפִיר]]); Ge 49:9 in sim. of victor's repose ([[רָבַץ]]; ‖[[אַרְיֵה]]), cf. Nu 24:9 (c. [[שָׁכַב]]; ‖[[אֲרִי]]), De 33:20 ([[שָׁכֵן וְטָרַף]]); v. also Nu 23:24 ([[קוּם]]; ‖[[אֲרִי]]); fig. of Nineveh Na 2:12 (‖[[אַרְיֵה]]), cf. Is 5:29 ([[שָֽׁאֲגׇה]] in sim.; ‖[[כְּפִירִים]]); fig. of wicked Job 4:11 (+ [[אַרְיֵה]], [[שָָׁחַל]], [[כְּפִיר]], [[לַיִשׁ]] v:Job 4:10; v:Job 4:11); sim. of ´[[י]], devouring ([[אָכַל]]) in judgment Ho 13:8; fig. of locusts ´[[מְתַלְּעוֹת ל]] Joe 1:6 (‖[[שִׁנֵּי]] [[אַרְיֵה]]).
